Change Database Document
========================

.. automodapi:: lstcam_calib.tools.change_database_document
   :no-inheritance-diagram:

This tool permits to perform the main actions allowed on the database documents.
They are defined setting the option ``--change`` with one of the following ``ChangeType`` values:

    .. autoclass:: lstcam_calib.tools.change_database_document.ChangeType
        :members:
        :no-index:
